data.text: @coolit4567 @samstreetwrites Oh really, was this before your flight? Who did you fly with? I do appreciate it!
@sorry_honey_ @samstreetwrites For entry into the country proof of Vaccination is required, however this wasn't checked.
@samstreetwrites And another country exits Covid hysteria. More to follow.
@veresvera @MOwnaccount @PaulKirkby3 @samstreetwrites @capeekaboo I'm surprised since that day I only saw 1 whole person with a mask on. I expected a lot more people with covered faces.

@coolit4567 @samstreetwrites Big ask... But could you let me know if you encounter any issues or where you see the vax pass is needed over there?
Enjoy your trip
@sorry_honey_ @samstreetwrites Think there's a Vaccine pass requirement for some things
@samstreetwrites Come on Marbs. You can do this
@samstreetwrites Huzza, now when will Belgium do it. Miss good beer.
@Noreen1672020 @samstreetwrites Dude I was there Last Saturday (I'm from Greece) I had only rapid test they checked me and I went through.
